CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 23, 1954, pg. 15., reads: "Vice President Richard M. Nixon swung himself around with the crowd during his busy visit in Pittsburgh Tuesday. Upper left he shakes hands with William P. Young director of Republican campaign among Negroes, at airport while John L. Clark, reporter, smilingly thinks it through... - Harris Photo"
TitMainTitle: William P. Young shaking hands with Richard Nixon, with John L. Clark on right, in interior with horse and chariot patterned curtains
